overview: Friends Sara and Nina are going to the sea during the carefree summer holidays slightly differently than the majority - on foot, across Slovenia along the European footpath E-6, 14 days long. The path is overcome with such and different conversations, questions about life, thinking ... It is the path of physical efforts and endurance, the recognition of the distant beauty of Slovenia and the originality of nature, the landscape that lies under their feet. They are rich in new experiences, meetings with people. Of course it's not quite complicated and fun; Friendship is for a moment even a big test., The girls inevitably or inevitably meet special boys Žmigi and Jože, but they do not somehow shake them off until the end of the journey. After all, at the departure, they grow to their hearts.
title: How Far is the Sea
